message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8750.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8750. However, I'm willing to compromise further. I'm offering the product to you for $9200.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8800.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8800. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm offering the product to you for $9100.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8900.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8900. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm offering the product to you for $9050.
Thank you for your efforts in negotiating, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $8950.
